title: [管理|娱乐l信息]Join Staff Message —— 更好的加入提示插件[1.7-1.12]
author: 不死之躯
txt_content:
更好的加入提示插件


新增加入闪电

兼容[backcolor=rgb(241, 240, 175) !important]PERMISSIONSEX

截图：




权限：
登录闪电权限：[size=14.6667px]joinmessage.lightning
[size=14.6667px]加入离开权限：请看配置文件


配置文件：
###################################################################
# #
# Plugin Developed By @Ilario42 #
# #
# Version: 5.0 #
# #
###################################################################

#InfoPlugin Message (Only OP)
InfoPlugin: true

#This new feature allows you to use permissionsEX prefixes. Permissions: joinmessage.message
#PermissionsEx Join (YES PermissionsEx):
PermissionsJoinMessage: true
#PermissionsEx Leave (YES PermissionsEx):
PermissionsQuitMessage: true

#Join Message (NO PermissionsEx):
EnableJoinMessage: false
#Leave Message (NO PermissionsEx):
EnableQuitMessage: false

#Enable Lightning
#Permissions: joinmessage.lightning
EnableLightning: true

#PermissionsEx Message. Permissions: joinmessage.message
PermissionsJoin: '&9Staff> %prefix% &b%player% &6join the server'
PermissionsQuit: '&9Staff> %prefix% &b%player% &4left the server'

#User Message (NO Permissions)
EnableUserMessage: true
UserJoin: '&8Join> &7%player%'
UserQuit: '&8Quit> &7%player%'
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
#Custom messages that do not use permissionsEx. Enables the variables NO PermissionsEx, and disable YES PermissionsEx

#Enter the message that will be sent to the FOUNDER group
#Permissions: joinmessage.founder
founder: '&9Staff> &c&lFounder &b%player% &ajoin the server'
founderquit: '&9Staff> &c&lFounder &b%player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the ADMIN group
#Permissions: joinmessage.admin
admin: '&9Staff> &4&lAdmin &b%player% &ajoin the server'
adminquit: '&9Staff> &4&lAdmin &b%player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the ADMIN2 group
#Permissions: joinmessage.admin2
admin2: '&9Staff> &4&lAdmin+ &b%player% &ajoin the server'
admin2quit: '&9Staff> &4&lAdmin+ &b%player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the MOD group
#Permissions: joinmessage.mod
mod: '&9Staff> &2&lMod &b%player% &ajoin the server'
modquit: '&9Staff> &2&lMod &b%player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the MOD2 group
#Permissions: joinmessage.mod2
mod2: '&9Staff> &2&lMod+ &b%player% &ajoin the server'
mod2quit: '&9Staff> &2&lMod+ &b%player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the HELPER group
#Permissions: joinmessage.helper
helper: '&9Staff> &e&lHelper &b%player% &ajoin the server'
helperquit: '&9Staff> &e&lHelper &b%player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the HELPER2 group
#Permissions: joinmessage.helper2
helper2: '&9Staff> &e&lHelper+ &b%player% &ajoin the server'
helper2quit: '&9Staff> &e&lHelper+ &b%player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the BUILDER group
#Permissions: joinmessage.builder
builder: '&9Staff> &5&lBuilder &b%player% &ajoin the server'
builderquit: '&9Staff> &5&lBuilder &b%player% &7 left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the BUILDER2 group
#Permissions: joinmessage.builder
builder2: '&9Staff> &5&lBuilder+ &b%player% &ajoin the server'
builder2quit: '&9Staff> &5&lBuilder+ &b%player% &7 left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the PLUGINNER group
#Permissions: joinmessage.pluginner
pluginner: '&9Staff> &6&lPluginner &b%player% &ajoin the server'
pluginnerquit: '&9Staff> &6&lPluginner &b%player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the DEVELOPER group
#Permissions: joinmessage.developer
developer: '&9Staff> &1&lDeveloper &b%player% &ajoin the server'
developerquit: '&9Staff> &1&lDeveloper o&b%player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the STAFF1 group
#Permissions: joinmessage.staff1
staff1: '&9Staff> &a&l&nOperator&b %player% &ajoin the server'
staff1quit: '&9Staff> &a&l&nOperator&b %player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the STAFF2 group
#Permissions: joinmessage.staff2
staff2: '&9Staff> &a&l&nManager&b %player% &ajoin the server'
staff2quit: '&9Staff> &a&l&nManager&b %player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the STAFF3 group
#Permissions: joinmessage.staff3
staff3: '&9Staff> &a&l&nOP&b %player% &ajoin the server'
staff3quit: '&9Staff> &a&l&nOP&b %player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the VIP group
#Permissions: joinmessage.vip
vip: '&9Donator> &8&lVip &b%player% &ajoin the server'
vipquit: '&9Donator> &8&lVip &b&player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the VIP2 group
#Permissions: joinmessage.vip2
vip2: '&9Donator> &8&lVip+ &b%player% &ajoin the server'
vip2quit: '&9Donator> &8&lVip+ &b%player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the VIP3 group
#Permissions: joinmessage.vip3
vip3: '&9Donator> &8&lVipDragon&b %player% &ajoin the server'
vip3quit: '&9Donator> &8&lVipDragon &b%player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the VIP4 group
#Permissions: joinmessage.vip4
vip4: '&9Donator> &8&lVipSuper&b %player% &ajoin the server'
vip4quit: '&9Donator> &8VipSuper &b%player% &7left the server'
#
#Enter the message that will be sent to the VIP5 group
#Permissions: joinmessage.vip5
vip5: '&9Donator> &8&lVipTitan&b %player% &ajoin the server'
vip5quit: '&9Donator> &8VipTitan &b%player% &7left the server'
#
## End of file <-- No seriously, you're done with configuration.
#复制代码










[groupid=1306]Bone Studio[/groupid]
